Text: No viruses found. It was annoying as hell to watch though! The sound was faster than the already glitchy slow video feed. It actually took over three hours to get through it all! Didn't matter the media player or device for me. I give the sound 6 and video 4.5-5. Side note for those that were hoping for a clash of the titans prequel or sequel, its not. I hope others have better luck! Probly would have enjoyed it more if it wasn't for the sound screwing up...
